meanings.definition: To cut off the head of.
meanings.sent1: The executioner decapitated the criminal swiftly.
meanings.sent2: The guillotine decapitated the pumpkin in one clean slice.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick went wrong, and he accidentally decapitated his assistant!
meanings.sent4: The storm decapitated the trees, leaving a trail of destruction.
meanings.sent5: The sword decapitated the dragon, ending the battle in victory.

meanings.definition: Having had the head cut off.
meanings.sent1: The decapitated statue stood in the square, missing its head.
meanings.sent2: The decapitated doll looked eerie with its head lying on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The decapitated snowman sadly watched as the children rebuilt him.
meanings.sent4: The decapitated flowers drooped in the vase, unable to be revived.
meanings.sent5: The decapitated statue's missing head was a mystery to all who passed by.
